description: Introducing Oomph, a multi-function GPS utility. Oomph allows you to track where you've been and message your location, as well as displaying your current location, heading, velocity, and altitude. Use the "Send Location" feature to send contacts your current location as an address, coordinates, or even a map. With Oomph, you can compare routes and trips that you have taken. Oomph allows you to view maps and graphs of your trips showing altitude, velocity, and more. Use the "Analysis" feature to overlay data onto your previous trips for comparison. Oomph also allows you to view the maximum altitude and velocity attained during a trip. Use Oomph to compare alternate routes to a frequently traveled location, or to analyze your driving behavior. Oomph supports both US Standard/Imperial and Metric measurements, and includes options for precision and formatting of data. Oomph also includes a full menu of help topics.
